raw: Coronavirus: Hongkongers stuck on the Diamond Princess in Japan struggle with boredom, cabin fever and the threat of infection .
replaced: Coronavirus: Hongkongers stuck on the Diamond Princess in Japan struggle with boredom, cabin fever and the threat of infection .

raw: Hongkongers stranded aboard the docked Diamond Princess cruise liner in Yokohama for seven days say they have to contend with stifling boredom , confined spaces , erratic meal times and dirty bedlinen – on top of the ongoing threat of the deadly coronavirus .
replaced: The Youngs  the Diamond Princess in Yokohama for seven days say The Youngs have to contend with stifling boredom , confined spaces , erratic meal times and dirty bedlinen – on top of the ongoing threat of the new coronavirus , which has killed more than 900 people since emerging from the central Chinese city of Wuhan last month .

raw: Young Wo - sang and his wife manage to kill time by watching films and taking advantage of the free internet , but their only wish is to get home – in good health – as soon as possible .
